mapper.sql: CSC_ID, CSC_UID, CSC_AREACODE, CSC_YCBM, CSC_YCMC, CSC_CHECKPASS, CSC_CHECKTIME, CSC_CHECKTYPE, CSC_QUESTTYPE, CSC_QUESINTRO, CSC_ORGCODE, CSC_YEAR, CSC_RC1, CSC_RC2, CSC_RC3, CSC_RC5, CSC_ORGNAME, CSC_XDNAME, CSC_GROUPCODE, CSC_STATE, CSC_RC4, CSC_NEXT_VERIFY_TIME, CSC_SHEET_ID, CSC_APPLY_TIME, CSC_IFSTOPAPPLY
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from CIS_SHIP_CHECK
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into CIS_SHIP_CHECK (CSC_ID, CSC_UID, CSC_AREACODE, CSC_YCBM, CSC_YCMC, CSC_CHECKPASS, CSC_CHECKTIME, CSC_CHECKTYPE, CSC_QUESTTYPE, CSC_QUESINTRO, CSC_ORGCODE, CSC_YEAR, CSC_RC1, CSC_RC2, CSC_RC3, CSC_RC5, CSC_ORGNAME, CSC_XDNAME, CSC_GROUPCODE, CSC_STATE, CSC_RC4, CSC_NEXT_VERIFY_TIME, CSC_SHEET_ID, CSC_APPLY_TIME, CSC_IFSTOPAPPLY ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ycbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ycmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkpass,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quesintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rc3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rc5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rc4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextVerifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sheetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifstopapply,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

CSC_ID,
CSC_UID,

CSC_IFSTOPAPPLY,

mapper.update:
update CIS_SHIP_CHECK
CSC_ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_UID = #{record.uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_AREACODE = #{record.areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_YCBM = #{record.ycbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_YCMC = #{record.ycmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_CHECKPASS = #{record.checkpass,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CSC_CHECKTIME = #{record.checktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_CHECKTYPE = #{record.checktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_QUESTTYPE = #{record.questtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_QUESINTRO = #{record.quesintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_ORGCODE = #{record.orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_YEAR = #{record.year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_RC1 = #{record.rc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_RC2 = #{record.rc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_RC3 = #{record.rc3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_RC5 = #{record.rc5,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CSC_ORGNAME = #{record.orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_XDNAME = #{record.xdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_GROUPCODE = #{record.groupcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_RC4 = #{record.rc4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_NEXT_VERIFY_TIME = #{record.nextVerifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_SHEET_ID = #{record.sheetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_APPLY_TIME = #{record.applyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSC_IFSTOPAPPLY = #{record.ifstopapply,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update CIS_SHIP_CHECK set CSC_ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_UID = #{record.uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_AREACODE = #{record.areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_YCBM = #{record.ycbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_YCMC = #{record.ycmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_CHECKPASS = #{record.checkpass,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CSC_CHECKTIME = #{record.checktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_CHECKTYPE = #{record.checktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_QUESTTYPE = #{record.questtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_QUESINTRO = #{record.quesintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_ORGCODE = #{record.orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_YEAR = #{record.year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_RC1 = #{record.rc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_RC2 = #{record.rc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_RC3 = #{record.rc3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_RC5 = #{record.rc5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CSC_ORGNAME = #{record.orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_XDNAME = #{record.xdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_GROUPCODE = #{record.groupcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_RC4 = #{record.rc4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_NEXT_VERIFY_TIME = #{record.nextVerifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_SHEET_ID = #{record.sheetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_APPLY_TIME = #{record.applyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSC_IFSTOPAPPLY = #{record.ifstopapply,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.select: SELECT T.CSC_YEAR YEAR,T.CSC_CHECKTYPE LP_CODE_TYPENUM,T.CSC_CHECKTYPE types, COUNT(*) NUM FROM CIS_SHIP_CHECK T WHERE T.CSC_ORGCODE = #{orgCode} AND T.CSC_YEAR BETWEEN #{startY} AND #{endY} GROUP BY T.CSC_YEAR ,T.CSC_CHECKTYPE ORDER BY T.CSC_YEAR DESC ,T.CSC_CHECKTYPE ASC

SELECT T.CSC_YEAR YEAR,T.CSC_CHECKTYPE LP_CODE_TYPENUM,T.CSC_CHECKTYPE types, COUNT(*) NUM FROM CIS_SHIP_CHECK T WHERE T.CSC_ORGCODE = #{orgCode} AND T.CSC_YEAR BETWEEN #{startY} AND #{endY} GROUP BY T.CSC_YEAR ,T.CSC_CHECKTYPE ORDER BY T.CSC_YEAR DESC ,T.CSC_CHECKTYPE ASC

select sum(t1.ton) from (select substr(csc.CSC_CHECKTIME ,0,4) year,cs_shipcode code,sum(distinct to_number(csi.CS_TONNAGE)) ton
group by substr(csc.CSC_CHECKTIME ,0,4),csi.cs_shipcode)t1 group by t1.year ORDER BY t1.year ASC

select sum(t1.power) from (select substr(csc.CSC_CHECKTIME ,0,4) year,cs_shipcode code,sum(distinct to_number(csi.CS_POWER)) power
group by substr(csc.CSC_CHECKTIME ,0,4),csi.cs_shipcode)t1 group by t1.year ORDER BY t1.year ASC
mapper.sql: case when cs.CS_SHIPMATERIAL = '13_1' then '钢质' when cs.CS_SHIPMATERIAL = '13_2' then '木质' when cs.CS_SHIPMATERIAL = '13_3' then '玻璃钢质' else '其他' end
